benchmark_details.name: ContractEval
benchmark_details.overview: ContractEval is the first benchmark to systematically evaluate both open-source and proprietary large language models (LLMs) on clause-level contract review tasks in legal risk identification.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the performance of large language models in identifying clause-level legal risks in commercial contracts.

data.annotation: Annotated by law students with specialized training under supervision of experienced lawyers.

methodology.calculation: F1 Score is calculated as 2 * (Precision * Recall) / (Precision + Recall).
methodology.interpretation: A higher F1 Score indicates better performance in identifying relevant clauses.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT 4.1 and GPT 4.1 mini achieved the highest F1 scores of 0.641 and 0.644 respectively.
methodology.validation: Evaluated on the Contract Understanding Atticus Dataset test set.
